Nightlight/Trinity:

"When will come back Windlord?" asked Trinity.

"He will be back soon Trinity" replied Nightlight, who had started to 
bring the Energon to Burning Hammer, Aerotaur, Trinity and herself. 

Trinity looked the energon and later looked to Nightlight, Bullet and 
Aerotaur "Is he going to be ok???"
